Literature.Title: Studies on Tridecaptin B(1), a Lipopeptide With Activity Against Multidrug Resistant Gram-negative Bacteria
Literature.Author: Cochrane SA, Lohans CT, van Belkum MJ, Bels MA, Vederas JC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 21928(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus mycoides ATCC 21929(MIC=>100µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=50µg/ml)
